attributes.action: Own up to his responsibilities/deeds and dissolve parliament before he kills the uk economy completely
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Gordon Brown is personally directly responsible for all the processes/situations that were in place at HMRC at the time of the recent data loss.

His actions directly led to the sacking of experienced IT staff in favour of a handful of contractors who have no idea what they're doing, he created the processes whereby the loss/theft was inevitable, and he refused to give the ICO the powers that they need to do their job.
He has personally compromised the security of every child in the country.

He was also responsible for the Northern Rock crisis as he was in charge of all the relevant departments/policies which caused the bank to continue without a sound footing.

Every crisis related to the UK since he came to power has been a direct result of the actions (or inaction) that he took when he was chancellor, as he was essentially in charge of all UK policy/departments during Tony Blair's reign (in return for Blair having freedom on foreign policy).

I for one have had enough of an incompetant corrupt sociopath being in charge of this country, and I'd like to see him admit that he's just not up to it and to dissolve parliament before he kills the entire country's future.
